lines.text: You were very good last night. Not great, but for a gringo good enough.
I have a weakness for small men. Small puritans obsessed by power.
One must act with severity, or perish.
I cannot help noticing Sir, during the time I've spent with you, that you've betrayed every principle you've had, and all the men who supported you. May I ask why?
No one will remember Walker. No one will remember men who lose.
